Comment_contributor: (lit: like emu's feet ) * 'emu' is a kind of large bird living in Brazil
Comment_glosser: Contributor comment likely refers to nandu, not emu (?) as the latter live in Australia.

Comment_contributor: ( litː all the digits on the hands )
Comment_glosser: The form also includes the Portuguese diez.

Comment_contributor: ( litː all the digits on the feet )
Comment_glosser: The form also includes the Portuguese veinte.
